author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 1, 64, 708 children below five years of age will be administered polio drops in the second phase of polio immunisation drive to be held in Virudhunagar district on February 21, Sunday.

According to an official press release, 4,580 government employees, along with members of self-help groups, voluntary organisations and students, will be involved in the campaign.

Thirty one mobile teams will be formed to administer the vaccine in bus sands, railway stations, temple festivals and weddings. The teams will also be stationed at toll plazas along the National Highway, besides Sri Lankan refugee camps.
title: 1.64 lakh children to get polio drops
